Primary Executive: Roxie Van Aller, Executive Director; Email: kelfamcr.ed@shawbiz.ca
Service Details: - Provides affordable counselling to adults, children and families- Offers both group and individual counselling- All counselling is confidential and provided by counsellors with a Master's Degree- Programs and services include:  adult services; Stopping the Violence Women's counselling service, Parenting Wisely, Children and Change, Finding our Voices drop-in group sessions, Reaching Women 50+ (ROW), Women's Relationship Drop-in group sessions, Men's Relationship Drop-In group sessions, couples counselling, child, youth and family services- Also offers Fee for Service counselling
